title: Tutorial for Two Way Data Binding Using AngularJS
content: This post is the continuation of my previous AngularJS tutorial, I had explained JSON parsing using AngularJS. title: How to use ASP.NET Web API cross-origin with ASP.NET Identity ?
content: ASP.NET Web API is a fantastic piece of the .NET family (there is certainly some weirdness since we now have MVC and Web API with nearly identical methods, but ASP.NET MVC 6 is coming :)). However, getting a SPA or mobile hybrid (Ionic!) app working isn’t the most pleasant experience.

title: AngularJS with JSX

content: I've taken up TypeScript over the last few months, and it is such a breath of fresh air.
